description: This file contains utility functions such as 'emptyArray' for creating arrays of a specified length and 'sayHello' for logging a greeting message, intended to be imported and used in other parts of the project.

methods.name: export function emptyArray<T>(length: number) { emptyArray
methods.description: Creates and returns a new array of the specified length with generic type T.

methods.name: export function sayHello() { sayHello
methods.description: Logs a greeting message 'Hello from snippets/external.ts' to the console.
